question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Population Day (WPD)?
option1: Be counted: say what you need
option4: Family Planning- Empowering People, Developing Nations
answer: Family Planning- Empowering People, Developing Nations
explanation: The World Population Day (WPD) is observed every year on July 11 to increase the awareness of the people towards the worldwide population issues. The 2017 theme is “Family Planning- Empowering People, Developing Nations”. Family planning allows people to attain their desired number of children and determine the spacing of pregnancies. The world population has grown tremendously over the past years.  It should be noted that China has the highest population in the world and India stood at second.
